pattpack.image
Class ImageReaderFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pattpack.image.ImageReaderFactory
public class ImageReaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates instances of classes that read images in specific formats, e.g., gif, jpeg, png, ... It does not need to be public. It is public to ease the documentation.

Field Summary

          Maps filename extensions, e.g., "gif", "jpg", to classes, e.g., pattpack.image.GifReader.class.

createImageReader

public static ImageReader createImageReader(java.lang.String format)
Create an ImageReader object to read an image in a specified format.
Parameters:
format - The extension of the filename containing the image.
Returns:
An instance of a class that reads images in a particular format, or null if the format is not understood.
